mapper.select: SELECT oil_source.*,company.*,co.COUNTY_NAME,co.city_code,co.city_name,SUBSTR(oil_source.scccode,1,2) AS scc1, SUBSTR(oil_source.scccode,3,2) AS scc2,SUBSTR(oil_source.scccode,5,3) AS scc3,SUBSTR(oil_source.scccode,8,3) AS scc4 FROM oil_source LEFT JOIN company ON oil_source.company_id=company.com_id LEFT JOIN ( SELECT county.COUNTY_ID,county.COUNTY_NAME,city.city_name,city.city_code FROM county LEFT JOIN city ON county.city_code=city.city_code ) co ON co.COUNTY_ID=company.county_id where oil_source.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert:
insert into oil_source
id,
company_id,
year,
oil_type,
scccode,
source_discrip,
sales_volume,
emission,
flag,
volume,
every_volume,
volume_count,
gun_num,
tank_num,

insert into oil_source (id, company_id, year, oil_type, scccode, source_discrip, sales_volume, emission, flag, volume, every_volume, volume_count, gun_num, tank_num) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{oilType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{volume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{everyVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{volumeCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{gunNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{tankNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_id = #{companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{year,jdbcType=CHAR}, oil_type = #{oilType,jdbcType=CHAR}, scccode = #{scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_discrip = #{sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales_volume = #{salesVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, emission = #{emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, volume = #{volume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, every_volume = #{everyVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, volume_count = #{volumeCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gun_num = #{gunNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tank_num = #{tankNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}

INSERT INTO oil_source (id, company_id, year, oil_type, scccode, source_discrip, sales_volume, emission, flag, volume, every_volume, volume_count, gun_num, tank_num) VALUES
( id = #{item.id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, company_id = #{item.companyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, year = #{item.year,jdbcType=CHAR}, oil_type = #{item.oilType,jdbcType=CHAR}, scccode = #{item.scccode,jdbcType=CHAR}, source_discrip = #{item.sourceDiscrip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sales_volume = #{item.salesVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, emission = #{item.emission,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, flag = #{item.flag,jdbcType=INTEGER}, volume = #{item.volume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, every_volume = #{item.everyVolume,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, volume_count = #{item.volumeCount,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, gun_num = #{item.gunNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tank_num = #{item.tankNum,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
